amendment.description: Amendment sought to align federal funding with the scope of federal clean water regulations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report to 112-144 to align federal funding with the scope of federal clean water regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 240 (Roll no. 568).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Connolly (VA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 240 (Roll no. 568).
